summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to Bayview Street; Brander Place from Atlantic Street to Grand Street; Twenty-ninth Avenue South and Thirtieth Avenue South, each from Atlantic Street to Bayview Street; and Bayview Street Twenty-seventh Avenue South and Thirtieth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks, and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2066 of the City Council of the City of Seattle and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
